name: Duplicate Outwards Supplies
query: select tabInvoices.invoice_number as 'Invoice Number',tabInvoices.invoice_date as 'Invoice Date', DATE(tabInvoices.creation) as Date, if(tabInvoices.gst_number!='','Registered','Un-registered') as 'Type of Customer', tabInvoices.invoice_type as Type, tabItems.type as 'Item Type',if(tabItems.type="Excempted","Without Tax","Regular") as 'Type of Supply',tabInvoices.trade_name as 'Name of Client / Customer', tabInvoices.gst_number as 'Customer GSTIN / UIN', sum(tabItems.item_value_after_gst) as 'Invoice value', sum(tabItems.item_value) as 'Taxable Value', convert(tabItems.gst_rate,CHAR) as RATE, convert(tabItems.gst_rate,CHAR) as 'GST Rate', convert(tabItems.igst,CHAR) as 'IGST Rate', sum(tabItems.igst_amount) as 'IGST Amount', convert(tabItems.cgst,CHAR) as 'CGST Rate', sum(tabItems.cgst_amount) as 'CGST Amount', convert(tabItems.sgst,CHAR) as 'SGST / UT Rate', sum(tabItems.sgst_amount) as 'SGST / UT GST Amount', convert(tabItems.cess,CHAR) as 'GST Compensation Cess Rate', sum(tabItems.cess_amount) as 'GST Compensation Cess Amount',sum(tabItems.cess_amount)+sum(tabItems.igst_amount)+sum(tabItems.sgst_amount)+sum(tabItems.cgst_amount) as 'Sum of taxes', if (tabItems.type="Included", if ((sum(tabItems.item_value)*(tabItems.gst_rate/100)) = (sum(tabItems.igst_amount)+sum(tabItems.sgst_amount)+sum(tabItems.cgst_amount)),"-",if(((sum(tabItems.item_value)*(tabItems.gst_rate/100)) - (sum(tabItems.igst_amount)+sum(tabItems.sgst_amount)+sum(tabItems.cgst_amount)))>-1 and ((sum(tabItems.item_value)*(tabItems.gst_rate/100)) - (sum(tabItems.igst_amount)+sum(tabItems.sgst_amount)+sum(tabItems.cgst_amount))) <1,"-",round(((sum(tabItems.item_value)*(tabItems.gst_rate/100))-(sum(tabItems.igst_amount)+sum(tabItems.sgst_amount)+sum(tabItems.cgst_amount))),2))),"-") as 'Reverse Calc',  tabItems.sac_code as HSN, tabItems.item_name as 'UQC', convert(count(tabItems.sac_code),CHAR) as Quantity from tabInvoices JOIN tabItems ON tabInvoices.name = tabItems.parent where tabInvoices.irn_generated in ("Success", "NA","Pending") and (DATE(tabInvoices.creation) between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s)  order by tabInvoices.invoice_number
